description.raw:
See pull request #81

After removing all the Gazebo-specific code from the plot manager, all that was left was the `topicCurve` member variable.

This PR removes the Manager completely. Besides serving only as a wrapper for the topic curve handler, the singleton approach feels incompatible Ignition GUI's plugin structure.

:warning: There is one change in behaviour though. 

With a single `topicCurve`, all canvases shared the same start time. Now, each canvas starts from a different zero. 

I'm not sure how this currently affects downstream applications. If we need them to share the time, we could make the variable static for example.

From my point of view, the time is already broken until we tackle issue #18.
